comment: Look at the logo on the truck, what do you see? Its the same people who are running the ships that bring Africans into Europe. Why would these allies of ours be flooding our country with the refuse of the third world? We are being destroyed, not by a superior army or an act of God, but by our fear of being called anti-semites.

Why would these allies of ours be flooding our country with the refuse of the third world? We are being destroyed, not by a superior army or an act of God, but by our fear of being called anti-semites.

                                          :mod (c / continent

                                                      :op1 "Africa")))
                                    :ARG2 c

                                          :op1 "Europe"))))))
      :snt2 (c2 / cause-01

      :snt3 (d / destroy-01
            :ARG0 (o2 / or
                  :op1 (a4 / army
                        :ARG1-of (s4 / superior-01))
                  :op2 (a5 / act-02
                        :ARG0 (p4 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "God"))))
            :ARG1 (w3 / we)
            :ARG1-of (c4 / contrast-01
                  :ARG2 (f2 / fear-01
                        :ARG0 w3
                        :ARG1 (c5 / call-01
                              :ARG1 w3
                              :ARG2 (o3 / oppose-01
